(Before following KitKat) 

Phobia glanced at Terrorsaur "Now that wouldn't be a logical solution 
to the problem now would it, there would still be two ships out there 
and we'd still be in here, nothing would change. Without change there 
would be no progress, without progress there would be no victory." 
sfter having his say he turned and walked out behind KitKat.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, wilddance_mare@h... wrote:
> Terrorsaur:
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> "I would tie you to a chair and weild your mouth shut," Terrorsaur 
> growled at Phobia. "That's what I would do!" He rolled his optics.
